attributes.action: Build a 2nd Entrance/Exit for Tesco Banbury
attributes.additional_details:
A local Facebook group was set up to gently take the mickey, but it has a very valid point. At certain times of the day, the retail park & Tesco are no-go areas due to the length of time it takes to get in or out. You end up with angry and frustrated drivers, aggressive driving and accidents waiting to happen. 

A 2nd entrance/exit onto the Southam Road would, I feel, go a long way to dramatically reduce this. Allowing everyone to use the facilities as they'd expect, without hassle
attributes.background: As we get closer to the festive season, more and more people are finding they are getting stuck in the car park for Tesco in Banbury - some even abandoning cars to collect children from school. Put in a 2nd entrance/exit to alleviate some of this stress
